short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default profile for Netflix, auto-logs chosen profile, bypassing 'Who's watching?' screen. Focus on viewing, not profile selection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DefaultProfile provides automatic login to your chosen profile on the Netflix platform, eliminating the need to navigate through the 'Who's watching?' screen and clicking on the appropriate tile. 😌🎥

Discover a new level of convenience with the 'DefaultProfile' extension dedicated to Netflix. Experience the comfort of using SVOD platforms on a new level. With DefaultProfile, you can focus on watching, not worrying about profile selection. 🍿💡

All you need to do is:
1️⃣Add the DefaultProfile extension to your browser, 👩‍💻
2️⃣Log in to Netflix, 🎬
3️⃣Select a profile from the pop-up extension.🧑‍🤝‍🧑

✨The next time you log in to Netflix, when the 'who's watching' page appears, the profile will be automatically selected without your intervention. If there is only one profile on the account, it will automatically be chosen. It's that simple! 🙌
